p: Andrographolide has been studied for its effects on cell signaling, immunomodulation, and stroke. Using computational approaches, Enmozhi et al. ( 2020) showed that andrographolide ( 15), an extremelly bitter labdane diterpenoid isolated from Andrographis paniculata (Burm.f.) Wall. ex Nees, docked successfully in the binding site of SARS-CoV-2 M pro. The molecule obeys Lipinskiâ€™s rule making it a promising compound to treat COVID-19 (Enmozhi et al. 2020).
